# üõí E-commerce Website

A full-stack e-commerce web application built with modern web technologies.

## üöÄ Features

- üõçÔ∏è Product Listings
- üîç Product Search & Filtering
- üß∫ Add to Cart
- üí≥ Online Payment Integration
- üîê User Authentication & Authorization
- üì¶ Order Management
- üõ†Ô∏è Admin Dashboard

## üß∞ Tech Stack

**Frontend:**
- React.js
- Tailwind CSS

**Backend:**
- Node.js
- Express.js
- MongoDB

**Payment Gateway:**
- Razorpay

## üì¶ Installation

1. Clone the repo:

   cd ecommerce-website
